purpose: PostCSS configuration file that sets up CSS processing plugins for the project, specifically configuring Tailwind CSS and Autoprefixer
key_points: Enables Tailwind CSS for utility-first CSS framework
Enables Autoprefixer for automatic vendor prefix addition
Minimal configuration with default plugin settings

issues: No explicit plugin versions specified - could lead to compatibility issues
Empty configuration objects for plugins - might need custom settings later
No additional PostCSS plugins configured (e.g., cssnano for minification)
Could benefit from environment-specific configurations for development vs production
